type: Purchase of spots for dairy cows
short_summary: The department is looking for the acquisition of flexible carpets for dairy cows including delivery and installation.
description: This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the department, no bidding allowed.
tags: Purchase of flexible carpets for dairy cows
full_summary:
Seller and Government Agency Details
================================じゃ

*   **Title and Reference:** Request for Proposal (RFP) No. WS4296532184-Doc4302485967
    *   English title: Flexible Carpets for Dairy Cows
    *   French title: Achat de tapis souples pour vaches laitières

Requirements
------------

*   **Goods Ordered:** Flexible carpets for dairy cows, including delivery and installation services, at a location in Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada.

Key Details
------------

*   **Bid Submission Date and Time:** January 16, 2024, by 2:00 PM (ET)

Contract Terms
---------------

*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive, open bidding
*   **Evaluation Criteria:** Lowest Price
*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** Sherbrooke, Quebec, Canada

Contact Information
-------------------

*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    *   Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
    *   Contact: Adjakly, Efoené (he/they), PSPC, efoe.adjakly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Additional Documents
---------------------

*   Please review the RFP for detailed requirements and Annex Statement of Requirement.
